1. Load Datasets

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Load RNA CSVs
load_rna_csv <- function(path) {
  df <- read_csv(path)
  rownames(df) <- df[[1]]
  df <- df[, -1]
  return(df)
}

mirna <- load_rna_csv("data/mirna.csv")
pirna <- load_rna_csv("data/pirna.csv")
trna  <- load_rna_csv("data/trna.csv")

# Preview
head(mirna[, 1:5])
```
